subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Malone and Martin St. Louis scored 2 minutes 18 seconds apart in the third period Thursday night to rally the Tampa Bay Lightning to a 4-2 preseason victory over the Rangers at Madison Square Garden. Dan Fritsche and Lauri Korpikoski scored for the Rangers. ¶Jean-Sébastien Aubin made 18 saves in the first two periods and Martin Biron stopped six shots in the third period in the Philadelphia Flyers’ 4-0 preseason victory over the Islanders in London, Ontario. isles (AP).
